results.title: Afghanistan: threads of life
results.creator_credit: Irwin Dermer and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
results.brief_description: Provides an overview of aspects of the way of life in Afghanistan. Shows the age old methods of making grape juice, rug making, baking, and salt grinding. Also shows the lifestyle of the camel traders and the atmosphere of the bazaars where the rug and carpet makers go to find the best possible price for their wares.

results.title: Affordable Housing: Dream or Reality
results.brief_description: With changing lifestyles and the enormous cost of buying a freestanding home, this video looks at basic alternative design elements in housing and town planning to accommodate both aesthetically.

results.title: Adventuring pups
results.creator_credit: Morton Schindel and Young America Films
results.brief_description: A film designed to stimulate observation in the young child, by introducing three puppies, and following their adventures on a farm and in the woods.

results.title: Adventures of Bunny Rabbit
results.brief_description: Story of a mother rabbit and her very hungry son, Bunny Rabbit, who goes in search of fresh lettuce on a nearby farm. After several encounters with other animals and two narrow escapes from a hungry fox and an angry farmer, Bunny hurries home, much wiser about the ways of the outside world. Designed to teach younger children the features and habits of rabbits and other woodland and farm animals. No other credits available.

results.title: Adventure in Venice
results.creator_credit: John Barnes and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
results.brief_description: Presents aspects of day-to-day life in Venice. Tells a story about a boy who loses a prized model ship on the waterways of his city. Gives a comprehensive view of this water dependent city, noting the historic sites and large tourist trade.
results.description: Presents aspects of day-to-day life in Venice. Tells a story about a boy who loses a prized model ship on the waterways of his city. Gives a comprehensive view of this water dependent city, noting the historic sites and large tourist trade.

results.title: Advanced science: the spectrograph
results.creator_credit: Morag MacLennan and World Wide Pictures
results.brief_description: Demonstrates the nature and principles of the spectrograph by natural photography and by animated diagram. Illustrates the use of the spectrograph in qualitative and quantitative detection of impurities; in biological research in criminology; and in astronomy.

results.title: Advanced science: isotopes
results.brief_description: This film describes the nature and production of isotopes; radio-active isotopes and their use in industry and medicine. Shows natural uranium being separated into isotopes; uses lithium as an example to explain the meaning of isotopes; history of their discovery; methods of separating isotopes, and the making of radio-isotopes and their uses are illustrated.

results.title: Advanced editing
results.creator_credit: Lynn John, John A. Givins and KTV Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode number 13 of Series “Video tech”.
Focuses on advanced editing principles and the editing suite including the Beatcam editing suite, the S-VHS edit bench, how to assemble and insert edits, the mixing of sound including voice overs, graphics, sound effects and sound mixing.
